AnyClip Privacy Policy

1.1.          We share information with our affiliated companies about you.
In certain cases, we may or will anonymize or de-identify your Information and further use it for internal and external purposes, including, without limitation, to improve the services and for research purposes.
This privacy policy (" Privacy Policy ") explains what information we collect, use, process or disclose about you (" you ") in connection with the Services.
We use this anonymous or de-identified information and/or disclose it to third parties without restrictions (for example, in order to improve our services and enhance your experience with them).
We will use your information to provide you with the Services.
We, as well as third parties that provide content, advertising, or other functionality on the Services, may use cookies, pixel tags, local storage, and other technologies to automatically collect information through the Services.

Please note that we do not respond to or honor DNT signals or similar mechanisms transmitted by web browsers, but we may allow third parties, such as companies that provide us with analytics tools, to collect personally identifiable information about an individual consumer's online activities over time and across different web sites when a consumer uses the services.
We also collect the contact and billing information of our customers.
The Platform uses cookies to remember your preferences and/or support the use of digital rights management systems.
